content: darumaka is approximately 8cm their body is 6 5cm in width 12cm in with from fingertip to fingertip weight 32g this includes all materials used to make darumaka to give you some perspective the yarn i use comes in 100g balls which means you will not need a lot of each colour - 2mm hook - stylecraft special dk in tomato spice and citrus shiny fondant saffron and lemon - 6mm black safety eyes - white felt - toy filling - pins to place pieces before sewing together - needle - stitch markers i prefer using scrap yarn as stitch markers - fibres in black white orange and yellow for needle felting* - needle felting tool* * please note that i have used needle felting to create the various details around darumaka s face and body needle felting is still something i don t feel comfortable teaching i m still just winging it so i will not be including instructions on how to do this a quick google search will give you plenty of instructions from actual experts or you may want to look into alternative ways of creating the these details
